Text.Page:
All day long I deal with elves—if one of them calls me a "child" again, I won't be held responsible for my actions. And the baraka? They never get the joke. I don't mind the amani—they don't complain much—and I'll never figure out humans.

Don't cross a popori, though. I dueled one long ago...and still have the scar to prove it!

That's the federation for you. We're all happy drones...I mean citizens.
